feature_evidence.json: Feature report mapping Valentine UI requirements to related frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each main frontend source file.
frontend/index.css: Root Tailwind layers and OKLCH theme variables defining light/dark romantic color palettes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry page mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Minimal wrapper rendering the ValentinePage component.
frontend/src/components/FloatingHeartsBa: Canvas animation rendering drifting pink heart shapes as a background.
frontend/src/components/HeartConfetti.ts: Canvas confetti effect animating falling rotating hearts with timed fade-out.
frontend/src/components/MusicControl.tsx: Floating button toggling Web Audio APIâ€“generated romantic tones.
frontend/src/components/SuccessDialog.ts: Modal dialog showing congratulatory Valentine message with heart confetti.
frontend/src/components/ValentinePage.ts: Main interactive Valentine screen implementing moving No button, scaling Yes button, and success modal.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and stored identity restoration.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, custom color variables, animations, and themed utility classes for the romantic UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, plugins, and responsive container settings.
project_state.json: Describes the project's current state, features, assets, and requirements for a romantic Valentine-themed website.
